scripts.public: mkdir -p public && mkdir -p public/css && mkdir -p public/script
scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/client/main.js > public/script/app.js
scripts.copy-files: cp src/client/index.html public/index.html && cp src/client/css/main.css public/css/main.css
scripts.copy-files-front-dev: cp front_dev/index.html public/front_dev/index.html && cp front_dev/style/app.css public/front_dev/style/app.css && cp -R front_dev/style/img public/front_dev/style/img
scripts.copy-fonts: cp -R src/client/css/fonts public/css/ && cp src/client/css/style.styl public/css/style.styl
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run copy-files && npm run build-js
scripts.build-front-dev: npm run public-front-dev && npm run copy-files-front-dev && npm run copy-fonts-front-dev && npm run build-js-front-dev
scripts.dist: babel src/server/index.js src/server/**/*.js src/server/**/**/*.js --out-dir bin --presets es2015
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
